about.title: About Me
description: I am ALBRAA ALMASHWAKI, a seasoned physiotherapist with extensive experience in rehabilitation therapy and sports medicine. My practice focuses on evidence-based treatments tailored to each patient's unique needs, combining traditional physiotherapy techniques with modern approaches to achieve optimal results.

With expertise in manual therapy, exercise prescription, and functional rehabilitation, I help patients recover from injuries, manage chronic conditions, and improve their overall quality of life through personalized care plans and ongoing support.

items.title: Senior Physiotherapist
items.description: Leading a team of rehabilitation specialists, developing comprehensive treatment plans, and providing hands-on patient care. Specialized in sports injuries and post-operative rehabilitation for high-performance athletes.

items.title: Physiotherapist
items.description: Provided specialized physiotherapy services for professional athletes and sports teams. Developed and implemented rehabilitation programs for acute and chronic injuries, emphasizing functional movement patterns and return-to-play protocols.

items.title: Junior Physiotherapist
items.description: Delivered comprehensive physical therapy interventions to diverse patient populations, including geriatric care, neurological rehabilitation, and musculoskeletal treatments. Collaborated with multidisciplinary healthcare teams to optimize patient outcomes.

items.title: Sports Rehabilitation Specialist
items.description: Comprehensive certification program covering advanced manual therapy techniques for orthopedic conditions. Focused on evidence-based assessment and treatment protocols for complex musculoskeletal disorders.

items.title: Sports Rehabilitation Specialist
items.description: Comprehensive certification program covering advanced manual therapy techniques for orthopedic conditions. Focused on evidence-based assessment and treatment protocols for complex musculoskeletal disorders.

items.title: Dry Needling Practitioner
items.description: Comprehensive certification program covering advanced manual therapy techniques for orthopedic conditions. Focused on evidence-based assessment and treatment protocols for complex musculoskeletal disorders.
